title: WTB: Postcards or Pictures of Western Kansas Team
author: Vintageismygame

posts.post_title: WTB: Postcards or Pictures of Western Kansas Team
posts.post_content:
I am looking for postcards or pictures of baseball teams or single players from teams located in Western Kansas. 

I am specifically searching for a RPPC of a team from Hanston, Kansas. It was ebay a couple years ago and I saved it to look at it later that evening and when I went to view it, it was sold already.

Any help is appreciated.

Matt
